title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       John F. Kennedy National Historic Site is located in an urban setting. Be alert and aware!  Be careful crossing busy streets. Watch your step on uneven surfaces. Guard your valuables and lock your car. In an emergency, call 911.  To help protect park resources and ensure a safe and enjoyable visit for everyone, please follow park rules and posted regulations.  Pets are not allowed inside public buildings, unless a designated service animal. Please dispose of your garbage in trash containers or take it with you when you leave. Large bags are not permitted inside the historic structure. Lockers are available in the visitor center. Many neighborhood sites related to John F. Kennedy are privately owned. Please respect the property and privacy of these individuals.
